Text:
just to let ya know, there's no need for mdf2iso, it's already iso. just rename and you're good to go.

mdf2iso v0.3.1 by Salvatore Santagati
Licensed under GPL v2 or later
PS2.TMNT3.Mutant_Nightmare.mdf is already ISO9660.

also, on another note... the sfv file seems to be incorrect.. i forced recheck on the torrent and it appears to be 100%, but here's what i get when i check the sfv against the mdf...
